page.title: 15RELIGION 1
page.content: BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375 Christian:1 God rules in Holy Bible. All pray, doctrine of love/forgive- ness of sins taught by appointed ministers lay preachers/ch.members. There are 6 church buildings to which 61/122 of people interviewed went regularly to a Sunday service 10.30am/ 6.30pm to sing hymns, listen to bible readings, say prayers for others less fortunate.More peop.attended on special occasions e.g. Christmas, Easter, Anniversaries.Many 0-15year olds go to Sun.School/creche ll.00 Lrgst.L.L.Baptist Village Sun.School 48 children, all denominations, sit. opp.C.H. Farm771/615.Own graveyard, family graves e.g.Brocklehurst,Kirkham Poole,Rigby.Fownes Smith min.for 36yrs from 1829.Pres.Min.13th yr serves 4 Ch including Anderton Baptist,Hough Lane 64/756.Mod.ch.light inside.
